content.detailedDescription:
Last 2 years ago i was leaving the area call mangopir in karachi, that area has mountains and like a forest type area. at the time was midnight 2:00 am and my roof energy saver was problem i don't know what exactly happen with it, so i went on roof and want to change the light because it was too dark area , our project in boundary wall and all homes bond each other it was darkness so i started to change the saver so i called my brother to help me out and bring a light that i can easily change saver.
so when i doing this suddenly my brother said hey see up on the sky what's it.
when i saw up a strange sound happened like explosion and there was a ziczac biggest line i have see on the sky.
it was strange first time i found the internet people why talking about ufo , but i have think maybe that is usa invention and that was a saucer focus to us.
the sky was clean before and nothing on it the same thing saw our security guard and he also enclosed this situation next day to ppls.
well when i was talking our family members my elder bro and his wife evidence they many times seen a bright light object and it's come to near our colony and flashing the light just as like its taking pictures and fast move to on sky like ping pong ball and disappear.
my last comment i don't know exactly is it ufo or human race technology , but that's true this incident click my mind something is here around us.
content.summary: First time i have seen and not consider it's ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I am a retired helicopter pilot ...With 18,000 hours ...In 1958 3 of us teenagers were driving back from peterbough to toronto about 10pm when we saw a bright lite just a little north of us it seem to follow us maybe 20 min. or so when we slowed down and it went passed us. we stopped and watch it hover then slowly land in behind a forest of trees. we drove around to see if we could get any closer but couldnt so we got out and started to walk to see if we could find it until we got too scared, jumpback into the car and headed for home...In those days if you said you saw a ufo everybody would say you were crazy so for 30 years we just kept it to ourselves
content.summary: Bright lite following us westbound hwy 7a near port perry ont  it passed us and we watched it land

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 11:30 pm.  my ex-wife and i were returning home in the car when i saw through the front car window (i was driving) a light off to my right.  this light (i noticed as i watched it) was moving at an incredible speed.  as i continued to watch the one ligh became three lights.  my ex-wife saw the space ship as well. the ship we were observing now a few seconds later was over the car (about 500 fett above us) and as we watched it we saw a beautiful diamond shaped space craft.  it had multi colored loghts that were red, yellow and blue.  it slowed down over the car and made a turn.  then the lights blinked out. we saw nothing after that. i was watching it through my wind shield as was my ex-wife. we went home and both called dr hyneck's organization the center for ufo studies in evanston illinois to report it to them. they said it sounded like a real sighting.  i will never forget this as long as i live.  the entire sighting took about 30 seconds.
content.summary: None

content.detailedDescription: While sitting inside the house in the kitchen, facing south, with the tv on but no lights on in any of the rooms of the house, at approximately 1:13 p.M. on march 17th, the whole house inside and the surrounding area outside of the house went black. it was like some huge object blocked out the sun for a second or two. no noise was heard. two other people present in the house  questioned what just had happened. one person was about thirty feet from me and the other person was in another room on the same floor of the house. we have lived in this house for over twenty years and have never experienced such an occurrence .  we are under the flight path from o hare airport but at that time we did not hear any planes. it was almost like having a quick seizure  and blocking out only we did not loss consciousness . we all just experienced total blackness at the same time. we saw no object because of being in the house. but commenting about it afterward we agreed the blocking out of the light from the sun would have had to been made by something the size of a football field at least.  i know it happened because of having two other people being with me at that time.
content.summary: For a sec or two sky went black ,day was bright and sunny, three people in house observed event, all at the same time sked wht was that.

content.detailedDescription: Greys are remote controled for you are covered in desease and the pyrimids are compasses if you want more info please feel free to find me for hiding is the best way.For now
content.summary: We are not violent

content.detailedDescription: Was taking out trash late evening in the backyard i always look up at the stars when ever possible, happened to look up north east and saw what looked like a bright orange star but i noticed it was moving slowly downward in my direction as it got brighter, for a few seconds thought it was a falling airplane so i kinda got scared so i yelled my boyfriends name who was in the kitchen, it stayed still after that for a few seconds before it began to slowly dim out till it was no longer visible. about two minutes later we saw a very fast moving aircraft that flew in the area the ufo was in and very fast flew north east. the brightness of it looked like a floating fire ball.
content.summary: Saw strange  orange light in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back garden locking my greenhouse in preparation for going on holiday the next day.
it was a beautiful evening and everything was silent, no birdsong, no sound from nearby farm animals or any road traffic, so i stopped to enjoy the moment.
as i looked around i noticed a bright light in the sky moving in my direction from the south. 
air traffic going to glasgow airport often fly over my house flying from east to west at around 3000 feet which obviously cause a lot of noise - and also are very visible, but this "light" was in an unfamiliar flight path and totally silent.
i have seen similar things on television and the internet regarding ufo's and mentally thought to myself "i know what you are" and whether this was a co-incidence or not, the object immediately changed direction heading east.
it started to ascend and went directly into a small cloud - which was the only one in the sky and disappeared into it although i could still see it for a short time due to its brilliance.
i felt frustrated due to the fact that i always have my camera and binoculars to hand after a previous event, but unfortunately these were packed in my luggage as i was going on holiday the next day.
content.summary: Silent orb

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the laundry matt with my brother and grandmother. traveling on a golf cart on the main road in my town, landis avenue towards home. when i noticed to the north eat sky a low flying huge object flying over the wetlands. we stayed at the light on jfk boulevard and watched the object travel extremely slow.The object was dark and smooth shaped like a boomerang almost. the object we could see was traveling at a southern trajectory when it reached the boulevard then turned around heading to the north east. again the speed of the craft was to slow to be a plane, it took the craft at least one min to completely turn around to head. it's new trajectory. the object then appeared to pick up speed as it went off and as it travelled away we spotted two helicopters following the craft. we determined the helicopters were following the craft due to the flood lights on and they travelled in formation at the same elevation of the object heading off in the same direction. that evening as we sat in the living room the local news station 40 out of atlantic city reported the event also listing more witnesses and their trajectory of the craft.
content.summary: Saw an object on the way home with family.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on my front yard with my dogs, then i saw it.
2. im always looking to the sky.
3. fire. because it came from almost the land (mountains)
4. it was red, like fire, sphere shape, it flew very fast, from right to the left, then dissapear. 
5. i felt surprise, because an hour before i just recorded another sphere in the sky. then i thought, "i want to see another one" and then it appeared. 
6. disapear. it was cloudy.
content.summary: Red point on air

content.detailedDescription:
My parents and i were visiting friends when someone outside caught the attention of our friend, he went to check to see what it was, came back in and told us all to come outside. we all got outside and saw a perfectly circular object hovering in midair, out came a smaller object of the larger object and moved at 90 degrees to the left then did another 90 degree turn and went straight up, following this, 2 more objects came out and began to circle the 'mother ship' following this 6 or 7 smaller objects came straight out of the bottom and took off in different directions while they were gone the 2 objects kept circling the 'mother ship', once they came back the 2 circling went back in, the big ship moved to the left at 90 degrees stopped then moved back to the same spot, again moved back to the left turned 90 straight up and disappeared.
the side toward the sun had a gold shiny look, the side in the shade looked to be aluminum, it was totally smooth and no openings were seen. 
while we were outside i looked up the street and there were many people standing out in the street also watching this orb.
i am not too good on the keyboard would like to talk to someone, in person or on the telephone to give proper and complete information.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Went outside and saw a ball shaped object hovering 2balls came out the bottom and began circling object another came out straight down did a 90degree turn left,moved over , did another 90 degree turn and went straight up out of sight, 7 more balls came ou

content.detailedDescription: Last night my 20 year old son and i were driving him back to his school from spring break. we were on the pennsylvania turnpike extension, the road between exit 6 of the new jersey turnpike and the delaware river turnpike toll bridge. about two miles before the bridge, my son noticed to our left, red and blue lights in the sky and asked if i saw them too.  when i looked up about 20 to 30 orbs with several red or blue lights surrounding them were lined up in a triangle formation.  they appeared to be following a plane that was descending, not sure which airport it was headed for. the triangle shape looked massive compared to the plane.  at first i thought the lights were the outline of a large flying object but my son saw them fly into this formation so it appears these lights were individual crafts of some type.  we were driving and i got nervous and told him to keep driving.  now i wished we had pulled over to the side of the road to get a better look.  i called the florence township police but no one has reported seeing this last night.
content.summary: Ufo lights over nj turnpike pennsylvania extension

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my buddies patio smoking a cig, and looking up at the stars. i was looking at what at first i thought was a twinkling star, that i then noticed was moving in my direction from the south.  as it started to get closer i expected to hear a helicopter because of how the thing was moving but only science.  i started to really look at it hard to try to see what it was, at that moment as if it knew someone was watching it, it froze in mid air.  i felt like something was monitoring my thoughts, like tuned into my radio station.  it after frozen in mid air for about one minute shot up into the shy with a streak of light and disappeared in a split second.  i waited for a few more minutes and it did not return but there what appeared to be a military plane that flew by where the ufo had disappeared from.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It was moving like a helicopter without sound, seemed to notice me, stopped for a bout a full minute and shot off like the starship enterprise.

content.detailedDescription:
Playing in the back yard of my grandfathers home.
it came in fast   and stoped.
i very large rock with lights.
it was flying very fast into view stoped held its position for 2 min and went off very fast away from me.
i was frozen in place, this has been on my mind from the event. years after 4 times camping i was sleping and felt as if my body had been vibrating, i could not move or talk. i was with my wife she never woke up .
it went off faster then anything i had ever seen.
content.summary: It was like a large rock with lights. it came in fast stoped ,and very fast went off.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to look up at the stars, just like i always do;weather permitting. there are no street lights near my house. i was looking west,maybe north west when the ufo flew into my eye sight line...It could not have been more than 30 yards above a tree line that was 30 yards from me. it had to have flown right over my house flying from the east- southeast toward the west- northwest,and i never heard a sound... i never felt threatened,i was excited to see this dull white solid triangle body flying over head. it was flying against the broad side of the triangle instead of a pointed end. it did have lights but not blinking the way an airplane lights will blink ( i asked myself this question as it moved slowly away)but rather in a no pattern way..No search light or continuous light. i stood still and watched as this object stayed at the same slow speed,and continued to move in same direction til it disappeared out of my eye sight.

i do not know what it was,but it was not conventional. it did not look like one of our stealth triangle planes painted white. it moved way to slow for any airplane,and was smooth in its altitude. if it was an airplane i would definitely have heard the engines. if it was a helicopter i definitely would have heard its rotors....It was too close to me.

i was calm during and after,but happy to have seen something that i can not explain.
content.summary: Ufo was moving just above trees,and no sound. dull white triangle body

content.detailedDescription:
while playing frisbee with wife and son in our open yard where we can see miles in each direction

we all 3 heard  sounds directly above our head!

alot tike a large bird swooping down

it
 swoshed over our heads left us all wondering what made this sound , this feeling
almost like being a mouse in a field as a huge owl swoops down to get you !!

we looked at each other what was that!!! then looked all over the sky  for the object nothing 
after talking to wife and son ,we all felt and shared the same experience!

 all 3 of us felt as if it was a  30+ft.  invisible bird swooshed 2 times with great force 10 feet above our heads then gone 

it lasted about 4 seconds
content.summary: While throwing a frisbee with wife and 10 yr old son , some invisable , object ,entity,  flew, swished, over our heads . we were 30 feet apart  thowing the frisbee object felt over 30 ft. long, 2 great forces of air sound? pressure?  we saw nothing invisi

content.detailedDescription: I had an normal schedule early ultra sound taken. at two to three months the baby should not resemble a full human form. when i studied the picture you can clearly make out two beings with legs, feet, hands, head, eyes, and arms. in the picture it almost looks like they are posing, that is how clearly you can see the bone structure! and there is two of them, one standing right behind the other. the faces are a little oblong or wide. i even badge a joke to my parents ... saying,"if i'm not having twins then there are two aliens in there." that's how sure i was that i was having twins. now i am five months pregnant, i've had three ultra sounds since and everytime they only see one baby with one heartbeat. i now see the shape of the baby is never standing up perfectly straight. the baby is always turned out curled over, as a baby should be.Well the pproof is in the pudding as they say, if i tried to take a picture of the ultra sound photo it most likely will not be clear enough. but i still have the photo. i wish someone would just take a few minutes to look at it.
content.summary: Ultra sound photo. picture shows two alien shape figures. picture taken 2-3 months of pregnancy. i thought twins but doctors strongly say no

content.detailedDescription: From orange county california: i see this new small orange bright star light every night the last few months. north east sky after 10 oclock when its dark. sometimes it sits stationary and sometimes it moves around like a little kid runs around. i communicated with it with my iphone for 1.5 hours and so did my little 9 year old son, through live video we gave it commands and it did what we asked it to do, though there was a small lag time in coms. but it was consistant. we do it alot. but it always goes back to its original location when its done goofing off. to the right(more south & down a few degrees) is a brighter orange star which i call the mothership. that never moves. but the child orange star is out of this galaxy obviously and has extreme light speed and stopping and turning ability, with no tail or blur. more active after midnight. i see it every night. kinda getting boring now, but ufon is happy to come over and observe with me what i see many times a week. just to add the only thing that differs from its normal goofing off is the other night it came into our eyesight out of the black sky from the high west, then encircled the earth 180 degrees from west to east and rested in its normal stationary location( high north east)took it about 30 seconds i would guess. but every night i go out and just watch for a while and it moves around then it will jog quick right then stop,then jog up and then stop then do circles, then jog back really quick. its awesome but really interesting.
content.summary: Orangeish round starlike shape, flies around and has incredibile capibilities

content.detailedDescription: We were about to leave my mothers home in lapine, oregon and my mother saw that there was a full moon with a huge ring around it, so i thought wow this is cool never seen a ring around the moon that big before so i said i wish i had a camera so my daughter said here us my tablet, so i went to take a photo of the moon and her tablet picked up this weird round orb of some sort i was so at a loss of words on what this was i proceeded to have my mother, my boyfriend, and my daughter come and look and everyone of them was clueless and freaked out by this object, so i started to take photos as fast as i could then my daughter said you need to get this on video so we did and it is the most unexplained thing any of us have ever seen! this object was coming in and out of the trees and over the's trees and then moved so fast towards the moon and then back down to the trees again like it was hiding and we also believe that it knew our presence none of us can explain this we me, my daughter, and my boyfriend were all scared and beyond words after we left my mother's. after looking over the photos and the video it is no doubt that this thing had two lights on it plain as day not anything we can ever explain.We loss sight of this object after i told my mom to tell her boyfriend to come out and see it, however he did see it for like ten seconds.
content.summary: Weird and there were 4 of us whom all saw this thing!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and noticed a hovering light in the sky about 500 feet away.  it caught my attention because it was changing colors. at first i thought it was a helicopter until i realized that there was no sound and it was changing to colors that you wouldn't see on a helicopter. it appeared to be just a circular object, however once it started to ascend, it looked as if there was jet propulsion at the bottom. it was darting from spot to spot in a zig-zag motion quickly as it ascended while continuing to change colors. i was excited and confused which caused me to stop recording thinking it was gone for a moment but while i was making a phone call to tell my fiance about it, i saw it reappear. it continued making the same motions and changing colors for a few seconds then it suddenly disappeared from sight.  i was humbled by the experience and the realization that there might be other life forms in the universe and by the thought that i might have witnessed one of the sightings i've heard so much about.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering lighted object that changed colors and ascended

content.detailedDescription:
This story was recounted to me by my then girlfriend, who is a sober, college educated, clear-thinking person.  at the above time, about 1am, on a back road leading from bellingham, mass. my girlfriend and her friend were returning from a dance. they were headed back to rhode island via i 295 outside of woonsocket, ri.  they had nothing to drink at the dance.  the road, as she soberly related the story to me the next day, was deserted. the small mill town was 'tucked away' for that saturday night.  as they came to a cross road intersection, where no cars were seen, a bright, glowing ball of light, about the size of a basketball, as she related to me, crossed in front of their car at chest level.  she said the ball of light was not going at a high rate of speed, but she estimated it was going 5-10 mph.  she and her girlfriend watched in shock as this ball of light crossed in front of their car, proceeded west, and then suddenly changed direction, crossing the street to a church on the other side,  and then 'zipping' up over the church and steeple and down the other side and gone!  neither of them had ever seen a ufo before, and were quite animated in their description of the object, which seemed to be a 'probe' of some kind.
i decided to call the local wjar channel 10 news station the next day to report this incident.  the news director came on the phone to me.  i told him the story.  he said that the same object had been reported earlier that night in the framingham area of massachusetts. about 15 miles away.  he was rather stoic about receiving the report, as if resolved to do nothing about reporting the event to the public, even though it was collaborated by witnesses in two different towns not far apart.  apparently, this was not 'newsworthy' to wjar.
i feel my report, though 'second-hand,' needs to be evidenced as it shows how many other sightings go un-reported, either from witnesses not telling anyone or in this case local news stations refusing to broadcast the events publicly.  what is reported on the ufo phenomenon, i feel, is the 'tip of the iceberg.' most sightings by people all over never are made public.
content.summary: Basketball sized bright white glowing light at 4 ft. height crosses road at night.

content.detailedDescription:
very bright glowing object that disappeared completely after 1 minute approx.

as i was having a walk before going to bed on my terrace , i saw a noiseless spherical figure with a very bright glow .First i thought i might be a plane , but every plane blinks a red flashlight after 1-2 seconds during night .

but in this case there was no blinking . it was continuous bright light and approximately  after 1 minute the object got vanished .

the speed of the object was similar to a low speed plane.
content.summary: very bright glowing object that disappeared completely after 1 minute approx

content.detailedDescription: I was driving up the 103 hill and on the right of the road about 1000-1500 ft above us was a very bright what looked to be a ball from what i could tell moving very fast over the highway i seen it for about 5-6 seconds and then it flew right into a thin cloud and didn't come out the other side. i work for an airport manager and i know quite abit about what flys around here and i e never seen anything like this,nor have i made any claims of seeing something like this before.This was strange bright,quiet and incredibly fast.Like wow. i told my dad right away thinking he would think i was crazy or on drugs or something but instead gave me this site address.I will not forget this evening,also its a full moon tonight.
content.summary: Round, bright, very fast,very very fast. quiet.

content.detailedDescription: Taking a walk with my family.  wife noticed the object.  the light was too bright and orange red. looked different than the obvious panes in the sky
content.summary: Large fireball moved across the sky flashed then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It was a normal day and i was walking home from school when i had the weirdest feeling that i was being followed so i looked up ahead then behind me and thought a little bit before i felt like it was looking down on,me and i finally looked up to see a g grayish silver like object hovering in the sky and i stood there staring at it for about what i'd say was twenty minutes until i thought it might be a good idea to take a picture so i looked down to grab my phone which felt like it was only a second because by the time i looked back up it was gone and i stayed there for another five minutes to see if i'd cone back only to notice a jet but i didn't see anything after that and i continued on my way home.Now i must say i was excited because i was a kid but scared because at the time i had just learned about these and never thpught i'd see one and till up to now i wanted to keep it to myself not only because i didn't want it to cause problems for just my family but myself but it's bothered me for so long that i had to share it now. the object never made any sudden movements it just hovered there until i looked away and i didn't see how it left.
content.summary: I was little but even now i'm not even sure what i say

content.detailedDescription: It was a normal day and i was walking home from school when i had the weirdest feeling that i was being followed so i looked up ahead then behind me and thought a little bit before i felt like it was looking down on,me and i finally looked up to see a g grayish silver like object hovering in the sky and i stood there staring at it for about what i'd say was twenty minutes until i thought it might be a good idea to take a picture so i looked down to grab my phone which felt like it was only a second because by the time i looked back up it was gone and i stayed there for another five minutes to see if i'd cone back only to notice a jet but i didn't see anything after that and i continued on my way home.Now i must say i was excited because i was a kid but scared because at the time i had just learned about these and never thpught i'd see one and till up to now i wanted to keep it to myself not only because i didn't want it to cause problems for just my family but myself but it's bothered me for so long that i had to share it now. the object never made any sudden movements it just hovered there until i looked away and i didn't see how it left.
content.summary: I was little but even now i'm not even sure what i say
I've never seen anything,

content.detailedDescription:
back in 1964, i was taking my girl friend home from a night out. i was driving north on old sierra highway about half way between lancaster ca and rosamond ca. when i heard a warbling noise coming from the back of the car. i slowed down to almost too almost a crawl. now i was driving my old 1949, 2 door mercury, which was painted flat black, overhead came this object about 50 or so feet above us. as it went out in front of us��� it stopped. from out of the bottom came what looked like some ���flexible exhaust tubing��� it went from the craft straight down to the asphalt roadway. it started boring a hole. after about 2/3 minuets it went back up into the craft. then it went straight up and disappeared into the night sky.    
	i got out of the car and walked over to the hole��� it looked about 12��� deep and about 3���/4" in diameter. i went back to the car and started it with a little trouble. it seamed to be flooded. when it did start, i started driving north again. after about 5 minutes of driving, coming at me was four suv type vehicles going south at a very fast speed. they had to be from edwards afb. i took my date on in to rosamond and then just stayed in the car in her driveway. when i went home the next day, the asphalt had been repaired with a patch about 3��� square
content.summary: It took a sample of the asphalt.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving nne on horsepen rd. to home depot looking for plants about 9:30 am 2012 (date time approximate), beautiful clear weather, no clouds, sunny, warm but not humid or hot.
noticed an odd item in the sky at what appeared to be some distance. shape was rectangler, ratio about 2 to 1, wide side down, approximately horiztontal in the sky, appeared to be some distance away as the color of the object seemed somewhat greyed out, yet the "shape" was distinct. i continued driving, glancing back at it every few seconds. the thought crossed my mind that it was an aircraft towing a "banner", yet there did not appear to be any aircraft around. note that at one time i was stationed on an attack aircraft carrier. i've seen lots of aircraft in the sky in all kinds of weather conditions. i pulled off the road, stopped, and took a good long "look" at this thing. guess what, now there are two of them. over a period of about five minutes or so the total count would up at a total of seven of these rectangles, didn't appear to be going anywhere, just seemed to stay in the same place. the greyed out look did not change, size did not seem to change. what was very odd was that they were all in the same orientation, wide side down, somewhat like beads on a string. they were not "lined" up, no two were at exactly the same height, yet the difference between any two was no more that the "width" of any single object. in the horizontal sense none were any further apart from the next object than 1.5 times the width of an individual object. 
  obviously, this is a bit dated, but it was extremely strange, and yes, i have a very good memory. after a few more minutes, and no changes, i decided to continue to the store parking lot, about a mile. when i had parked i tried to relocate the objects, and they were not to be found anywhere. as i said, the weather was clear, early morning, no clouds, no aircraft in the vicinity. note that richmond does have a fair sized airport on the far side of town, about twenty miles or so to the east. whatever these things were, they seemed to be at some distance, and large to account for the greyed out look. this would also tend to indicate they were at a quite respectable altitude. my navy job was taking care of the search radar systems and related equipment, among other things. this event still bugs me so to speak, since i definitely can't account for it. i know what they were not, but not what they were. perhaps someone else has reported something remotely similar. if so, i'd love to hear about it.
content.summary: Seven rectanglar objects, somewhat in a line, not moving

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the graymore/devondale area of louisville. from our front yard (facing southeast)my wife and i noticed a formation of lights in the sky heading from the north east to southwest. we have a lot of air traffic in the area with ups traffic in/out of sdf and private planes into bowman field. and is in not uncommon to see ky air guard c-130s (in close formation with only red collision beacons) and national guard and police helicopters. the moon was about 15 degrees off the eastern horizon and the sky was clear with some intermittent cirrus clouds. 

but what was striking was the size of the formation; seven (7) bright orange/white objects. they each appeared to be glowing orange with a single bright flood light. we had just pulled into our driveway and got out of the car to watch them pass overhead. at first we thought that they might be chinese lanterns but they were moving too fast, northeast to southwest and against the wind, which was out of the southwest. as they passed overhead (they didn't make a sound) the brilliant white light went out and the orange glow began to fade. as they picked up speed the were above a layer of cirrus clouds. i would estimate the altitude at 25k feet and their speed similar to a commercial airliner at that attitude (400/ 500 mph). as the last object headed toward the western horizon, the glow was gone and it was appeared to be an orange colored slab and was clearly accelerating west-bound above the cirrus cloud layer. i took one photo with my cell phone. while the quality doesn't allow any detail, it does reflect what we saw....Glowing orange color with a brilliant white light at the front,
content.summary: Seven glowing orange and white objects flying in formation

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Driving southbound on river road just past the lester rd. intersection i saw a pulsing spherical light or orb or craft moving in a quick and sporadic flight path approx a couple of hundred feet above in the direction i was headed. it was just above the tree line and was executing quick turns and descending and ascending altitudes in a manner i've never seen. 

i pulled over and it had circled me and i watched and recorded it for a few minutes... see video at:

i returned home to get a better camera and brought another witness back to the scene. at this point it was directly above at least a few thousand feet. there were two lights, both looked the same that were pulsating and hovering. they moved away from one another after coming together and moved in a direct path very slowly. there was complete cloud cover and aside from the full moon, they were the only two lights visible. 

i zoomed in with my video camera and was as tight as i could get. i witnessed both through the camera and with the naked eye, the light pulsating and growing bigger, forming a typical saucer / star tetrahedron shape. it would expand and briefly blink out only to immediately return to it's original size and spherical shape. see second shot on video. we witnessed it for approx ten mins (around 10pm) and then left with it still high above in the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing pulsating orbs or crafts from 200 ft - 1 mile under clouds video
